#include <iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

/*
int length(char temp[100000])//Function to find out the length of the string
{
    int count=0,i=0;
    while(temp[i]!='\0')
    {
        count++;
        i++;
    }
    return count;
}
*/

int main()
{
    int tests=0,numb,m;//test= number of test cases , numb= count of the repetition of the pattern
    char name[100000],find[99999];//name=our main string , find=the pattern 
    //printf("Enter the number of test cases \n");
    scanf("%d",&tests);
    if(tests<=1000)
    {
    for(int i=0;i<tests;i++)//Will iterate for checking different test cases
    {
        numb=0;
        //printf("Enter the name of the string %d: \n",i);
        scanf("%s",&name);
        //printf("Enter the part you want to find %d: \n",i);
        scanf("%s",&find);
        for(int j=0;j<strlen(name);j++)//Will iterate for each element in the String
        {
            m=j;
            for(int k=0;k<strlen(find);k++)//Will iterate to find out the pattern from the current element
            {
                if(find[k]!=name[m])//checking the condition for the pattern
                    break;
                else if(k==strlen(find)-1)
                    numb++;
                m++;  
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n",numb);//Final output is printed
    }
    }
    return 0;
}
